message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product which I believe would be highly valuable to you. Given its unique benefits, I'm offering it to you for $14,000.
Hello Alice, thank you for considering my needs. I appreciate the value of the product you're offering. However, I can only commit to a maximum of $12,000 for the purchase.
Bob, I understand your position, but $12,000 is significantly below its true value.  I'm willing to meet you halfway.  How about $13,000?
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget constraints, I am able to consider a price up to $12,500 for the product.
